import React from 'react'; import caloriesIcon from '../../../images/icons/icons-small/calories-icon.png'; import proteinsIcon from '../../../images/icons/icons-small/protein-icon.png'; import fatIcon from '../../../images/icons/icons-small/fat-icon.png'; import carbsIcon from '../../../images/icons/icons-small/carbs-icon.png' const NutritionalInfo = ({ calorieCount, proteinCount, carbohydrateCount }) => { return (
{calorieCount}kCal Calories
{proteinCount}g Prot√©ines
{carbohydrateCount}g Glucides
{carbohydrateCount}g Lipides
); } export default NutritionalInfo;
